name: Bright Burning Beelzebob - [BBB]
description:
All he wanted to do was party till hell froze over, but destiny had something far greater planned for little Beelzebob. 

Also he accidentally locked himself out of the party, but that’s not really an engaging premise, so scratch that!

Venture on an epic adventure that makes Dante’s Inferno look like a cuddly walk in the park! Help the little flame find his way out of hell and back onto the dance floor by jumping around and doing other platformer things!Pay attention to your surroundings, unless you want Beelzebob’s flame to go out forever!

It’s quite simple:  Oil = good for flame, Water = bad for flame

Controls:
Movement: W,A,S,D
Jump: Space
Menu: ESC
